law.catch_line: PRESUMPTION IN PROSECUTION FOR NOISE VIOLATION.

section.text: It shall be unlawful for any person to use for any dog, attack and security dog training facility, or holding facility, a license receipt, or a rabies inoculation certificate issued to another person, dog, cat, or facility. (Code 1959 , §4-49; Ord. No. 1980-502, §4, 10-21-80; Ord. No. 2012-59, §5, 6-5-12, eff. 1-1-13)

structure.unit: Sec. 12-5009. - PRESUMPTION IN PROSECUTION FOR NOISE VIOLATION.
